item.title: My Erasmus Experience ðŸ“–ðŸŒŽ
item.description: As one of the top universities in Europe, TUM is highly ranked in global and European university rankings. According to Times Higher Education World University Rankings 2024, TUM is among the top 30 globally, both overall and specifically for Computer Science. TUM is also recognized as the best university in Germany, highlighting its excellence in research and teaching. My Erasmus Experience @ TUM During my time in the Erasmus+ program, I had the privilege of immersing myself in an environment that challenged me intellectually and personally.
